subject: Re: [junit] HTML Testrunner
msgSnippet: ... Why implement this as a new Runner class? It seems easier to do as a TestRunListener implementation. Or is this what you ve done? -- ﻿Elliotte Rusty
messageBody:
Andrew Wilson wrote:
> Hi,
>
> Ive written an HTML JUnit test runner. Like the text runner, but
> generates HTML.

Why implement this as a new Runner class? It seems easier to do as a
TestRunListener implementation. Or is this what you've done?

--
﻿Elliotte Rusty Harold elharo@...
XML in a Nutshell 3rd Edition Just Published!
http://www.cafeconleche.org/books/xian3/
http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ISBN=0596007647/cafeaulaitA/ref=nosim
